fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.DateStyle
fields.summary: Sets the display format for date and time values.
fields.description: Also controls interpretation of ambiguous date inputs.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.IntervalStyle
fields.summary: Sets the display format for interval values.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.TimeZone
fields.summary: Sets the time zone for displaying and interpreting time stamps.

fields.name: global.allow_system_table_mods
fields.summary: Allows modifications of the structure of system tables.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.application_name
fields.summary: Sets the application name to be reported in statistics and logs.

fields.name: global.archive_command
fields.summary: Sets the shell command that will be called to archive a WAL file.

fields.name: global.archive_mode
fields.summary: Allows archiving of WAL files using archive_command.

fields.name: global.archive_timeout
fields.summary: Forces a switch to the next xlog file if a new file has not been started within N seconds.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.array_nulls
fields.summary: Enable input of NULL elements in arrays.
fields.description: When turned on, unquoted NULL in an array input value means a null value; otherwise it is taken literally.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.authentication_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the maximum allowed time to complete client authentication.

fields.name: global.autovacuum
fields.summary: Starts the autovacuum subprocess.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor
fields.summary: Number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze as a fraction of reltuples.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_analyze_threshold
fields.summary: Minimum number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_freeze_max_age
fields.summary: Age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent transaction ID wraparound.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_max_workers
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running autovacuum worker processes.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age
fields.summary: Multixact age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent multixact wraparound.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_naptime
fields.summary: Time to sleep between autovacuum runs.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay
fields.summary: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds, for autovacuum.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit
fields.summary: Vacuum cost amount available before napping, for autovacuum.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor
fields.summary: Number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_vacuum_threshold
fields.summary: Minimum number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum.

fields.name: global.autovacuum_work_mem
fields.summary: Sets the maximum memory to be used by each autovacuum worker process.

fields.name: global.backend_flush_after
fields.summary: Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.backslash_quote
fields.summary: Sets whether "\'" is allowed in string literals.

fields.name: global.bgwriter_delay
fields.summary: Background writer sleep time between rounds.

fields.name: global.bgwriter_flush_after
fields.summary: Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

fields.name: global.bgwriter_lru_maxpages
fields.summary: Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round.

fields.name: global.bgwriter_lru_multiplier
fields.summary: Multiple of the average buffer usage to free per round.

fields.name: global.block_size
fields.summary: Shows the size of a disk block.

fields.name: global.bonjour
fields.summary: Enables advertising the server via Bonjour.

fields.name: global.bonjour_name
fields.summary: Sets the Bonjour service name.

fields.name: global.bytea_output
fields.summary: Sets the output format for bytea.

fields.name: global.check_function_bodies
fields.summary: Check function bodies during CREATE FUNCTION.

fields.name: global.checkpoint_completion_target
fields.summary: Time spent flushing dirty buffers during checkpoint, as fraction of checkpoint interval.

fields.name: global.checkpoint_flush_after
fields.summary: Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

fields.name: global.checkpoint_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the maximum time between automatic WAL checkpoints.

fields.name: global.checkpoint_warning
fields.summary: Enables warnings if checkpoint segments are filled more frequently than this.
fields.description: Write a message to the server log if checkpoints caused by the filling of checkpoint segment files happens more frequently than this number of seconds. Zero turns off the warning.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.client_encoding
fields.summary: Sets the client's character set encoding.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
fields.name: global.client_min_messages
fields.summary: Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.
fields.description: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.

fields.name: global.cluster_name
fields.summary: Sets the name of the cluster, which is included in the process title.

fields.name: global.commit_delay
fields.summary: Sets the delay in microseconds between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk.

fields.name: global.commit_siblings
fields.summary: Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

fields.name: global.config_file
fields.summary: Sets the server's main configuration file.

fields.name: global.constraint_exclusion
fields.summary: Enables the planner to use constraints to optimize queries.
fields.description: Table scans will be skipped if their constraints guarantee that no rows match the query.

fields.name: global.cpu_index_tuple_cost
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each index entry during an index scan.

fields.name: global.cpu_operator_cost
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each operator or function call.

fields.name: global.cpu_tuple_cost
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row).

fields.name: global.cursor_tuple_fraction
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the fraction of a cursor's rows that will be retrieved.

fields.name: global.data_checksums
fields.summary: Shows whether data checksums are turned on for this cluster.

fields.name: global.data_directory
fields.summary: Sets the server's data directory.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.db_user_namespace
fields.summary: Enables per-database user names.

fields.name: global.deadlock_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the time to wait on a lock before checking for deadlock.

fields.name: global.debug_assertions
fields.summary: Shows whether the running server has assertion checks enabled.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.debug_pretty_print
fields.summary: Indents parse and plan tree displays.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.debug_print_parse
fields.summary: Logs each query's parse tree.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.debug_print_plan
fields.summary: Logs each query's execution plan.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.debug_print_rewritten
fields.summary: Logs each query's rewritten parse tree.

fields.name: global.default_statistics_target
fields.summary: Sets the default statistics target.
fields.description: This applies to table columns that have not had a column-specific target set via ALTER TABLE SET STATISTICS.

fields.name: global.default_tablespace
fields.summary: Sets the default tablespace to create tables and indexes in.
fields.description: An empty string selects the database's default tablespace.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.default_text_search_config
fields.summary: Sets default text search configuration.

fields.name: global.default_transaction_deferrable
fields.summary: Sets the default deferrable status of new transactions.

fields.name: global.default_transaction_isolation
fields.summary: Sets the transaction isolation level of each new transaction.

fields.name: global.default_transaction_read_only
fields.summary: Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.default_with_oids
fields.summary: Create new tables with OIDs by default.

fields.name: global.dynamic_library_path
fields.summary: Sets the path for dynamically loadable modules.
fields.description: If a dynamically loadable module needs to be opened and the specified name does not have a directory component (i.e., the name does not contain a slash), the system will search this path for the specified file.

fields.name: global.dynamic_shared_memory_type
fields.summary: Selects the dynamic shared memory implementation used.

fields.name: global.effective_cache_size
fields.summary: Sets the planner's assumption about the size of the disk cache.
fields.description: That is, the portion of the kernel's disk cache that will be used for PostgreSQL data files. This is measured in disk pages, which are normally 8 kB each.

fields.name: global.effective_io_concurrency
fields.summary: Number of simultaneous requests that can be handled efficiently by the disk subsystem.
fields.description: For RAID arrays, this should be approximately the number of drive spindles in the array.

fields.name: global.enable_bitmapscan
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of bitmap-scan plans.

fields.name: global.enable_hashagg
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of hashed aggregation plans.

fields.name: global.enable_hashjoin
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of hash join plans.

fields.name: global.enable_indexonlyscan
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of index-only-scan plans.

fields.name: global.enable_indexscan
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of index-scan plans.

fields.name: global.enable_material
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of materialization.

fields.name: global.enable_mergejoin
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of merge join plans.

fields.name: global.enable_nestloop
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of nested-loop join plans.

fields.name: global.enable_seqscan
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.

fields.name: global.enable_sort
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of explicit sort steps.

fields.name: global.enable_tidscan
fields.summary: Enables the planner's use of TID scan plans.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.escape_string_warning
fields.summary: Warn about backslash escapes in ordinary string literals.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.event_source
fields.summary: Sets the application name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in the event log.

fields.name: global.exit_on_error
fields.summary: Terminate session on any error.

fields.name: global.external_pid_file
fields.summary: Writes the postmaster PID to the specified file.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.extra_float_digits
fields.summary: Sets the number of digits displayed for floating-point values.
fields.description: This affects real, double precision, and geometric data types. The parameter value is added to the standard number of digits (FLT_DIG or DBL_DIG as appropriate).

fields.name: global.force_parallel_mode
fields.summary: Forces use of parallel query facilities.
fields.description: If possible, run query using a parallel worker and with parallel restrictions.

fields.name: global.from_collapse_limit
fields.summary: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which subqueries are not collapsed.
fields.description: The planner will merge subqueries into upper queries if the resulting FROM list would have no more than this many items.

fields.name: global.fsync
fields.summary: Forces synchronization of updates to disk.
fields.description: The server will use the fsync() system call in several places to make sure that updates are physically written to disk. This insures that a database cluster will recover to a consistent state after an operating system or hardware crash.

fields.name: global.full_page_writes
fields.summary: Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint.
fields.description: A page write in process during an operating system crash might be only partially written to disk.  During recovery, the row changes stored in WAL are not enough to recover.  This option writes pages when first modified after a checkpoint to WAL so full recovery is possible.

fields.name: global.geqo
fields.summary: Enables genetic query optimization.
fields.description: This algorithm attempts to do planning without exhaustive searching.

fields.name: global.geqo_effort
fields.summary: GEQO: effort is used to set the default for other GEQO parameters.

fields.name: global.geqo_generations
fields.summary: GEQO: number of iterations of the algorithm.
fields.description: Zero selects a suitable default value.

fields.name: global.geqo_pool_size
fields.summary: GEQO: number of individuals in the population.
fields.description: Zero selects a suitable default value.

fields.name: global.geqo_seed
fields.summary: GEQO: seed for random path selection.

fields.name: global.geqo_selection_bias
fields.summary: GEQO: selective pressure within the population.

fields.name: global.geqo_threshold
fields.summary: Sets the threshold of FROM items beyond which GEQO is used.

fields.name: global.gin_fuzzy_search_limit
fields.summary: Sets the maximum allowed result for exact search by GIN.

fields.name: global.gin_pending_list_limit
fields.summary: Sets the maximum size of the pending list for GIN index.

fields.name: global.hba_file
fields.summary: Sets the server's "hba" configuration file.

fields.name: global.hot_standby
fields.summary: Allows connections and queries during recovery.

fields.name: global.hot_standby_feedback
fields.summary: Allows feedback from a hot standby to the primary that will avoid query conflicts.

fields.name: global.huge_pages
fields.summary: Use of huge pages on Linux.

fields.name: global.ident_file
fields.summary: Sets the server's "ident" configuration file.

fields.name: global.idle_in_transaction_session_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the maximum allowed duration of any idling transaction.
fields.description: A value of 0 turns off the timeout.

fields.name: global.ignore_checksum_failure
fields.summary: Continues processing after a checksum failure.
fields.description: Detection of a checksum failure normally causes PostgreSQL to report an error, aborting the current transaction. Setting ignore_checksum_failure to true causes the system to ignore the failure (but still report a warning), and continue processing. This behavior could cause crashes or other serious problems. Only has an effect if checksums are enabled.

fields.name: global.ignore_system_indexes
fields.summary: Disables reading from system indexes.
fields.description: It does not prevent updating the indexes, so it is safe to use.  The worst consequence is slowness.

fields.name: global.integer_datetimes
fields.summary: Datetimes are integer based.

fields.name: global.join_collapse_limit
fields.summary: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which JOIN constructs are not flattened.
fields.description: The planner will flatten explicit JOIN constructs into lists of FROM items whenever a list of no more than this many items would result.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.krb_caseins_users
fields.summary: Sets whether Kerberos and GSSAPI user names should be treated as case-insensitive.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.krb_server_keyfile
fields.summary: Sets the location of the Kerberos server key file.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.lc_collate
fields.summary: Shows the collation order locale.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.lc_ctype
fields.summary: Shows the character classification and case conversion locale.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.lc_messages
fields.summary: Sets the language in which messages are displayed.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.lc_monetary
fields.summary: Sets the locale for formatting monetary amounts.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.lc_numeric
fields.summary: Sets the locale for formatting numbers.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.lc_time
fields.summary: Sets the locale for formatting date and time values.

fields.name: global.listen_addresses
fields.summary: Sets the host name or IP address(es) to listen to.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.lo_compat_privileges
fields.summary: Enables backward compatibility mode for privilege checks on large objects.
fields.description: Skips privilege checks when reading or modifying large objects, for compatibility with PostgreSQL releases prior to 9.0.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Shared Library Preloading
fields.name: global.local_preload_libraries
fields.summary: Lists unprivileged shared libraries to preload into each backend.

fields.name: global.lock_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the maximum allowed duration of any wait for a lock.
fields.description: A value of 0 turns off the timeout.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_autovacuum_min_duration
fields.summary: Sets the minimum execution time above which autovacuum actions will be logged.
fields.description: Zero prints all actions. -1 turns autovacuum logging off.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_checkpoints
fields.summary: Logs each checkpoint.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_connections
fields.summary: Logs each successful connection.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.log_destination
fields.summary: Sets the destination for server log output.
fields.description: Valid values are combinations of "stderr", "syslog", "csvlog", and "eventlog", depending on the platform.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.log_directory
fields.summary: Sets the destination directory for log files.
fields.description: Can be specified as relative to the data directory or as absolute path.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_disconnections
fields.summary: Logs end of a session, including duration.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_duration
fields.summary: Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_error_verbosity
fields.summary: Sets the verbosity of logged messages.

fields.name: global.log_executor_stats
fields.summary: Writes executor performance statistics to the server log.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.log_file_mode
fields.summary: Sets the file permissions for log files.
fields.description: The parameter value is expected to be a numeric mode specification in the form accepted by the chmod and umask system calls. (To use the customary octal format the number must start with a 0 (zero).)

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.log_filename
fields.summary: Sets the file name pattern for log files.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_hostname
fields.summary: Logs the host name in the connection logs.
fields.description: By default, connection logs only show the IP address of the connecting host. If you want them to show the host name you can turn this on, but depending on your host name resolution setup it might impose a non-negligible performance penalty.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_line_prefix
fields.summary: Controls information prefixed to each log line.
fields.description: If blank, no prefix is used.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_lock_waits
fields.summary: Logs long lock waits.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
fields.name: global.log_min_duration_statement
fields.summary: Sets the minimum execution time above which statements will be logged.
fields.description: Zero prints all queries. -1 turns this feature off.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
fields.name: global.log_min_error_statement
fields.summary: Causes all statements generating error at or above this level to be logged.
fields.description: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
fields.name: global.log_min_messages
fields.summary: Sets the message levels that are logged.
fields.description: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.

fields.name: global.log_parser_stats
fields.summary: Writes parser performance statistics to the server log.

fields.name: global.log_planner_stats
fields.summary: Writes planner performance statistics to the server log.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_replication_commands
fields.summary: Logs each replication command.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.log_rotation_age
fields.summary: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N minutes.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.log_rotation_size
fields.summary: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N kilobytes.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_statement
fields.summary: Sets the type of statements logged.

fields.name: global.log_statement_stats
fields.summary: Writes cumulative performance statistics to the server log.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_temp_files
fields.summary: Log the use of temporary files larger than this number of kilobytes.
fields.description: Zero logs all files. The default is -1 (turning this feature off).

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
fields.name: global.log_timezone
fields.summary: Sets the time zone to use in log messages.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.log_truncate_on_rotation
fields.summary: Truncate existing log files of same name during log rotation.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.logging_collector
fields.summary: Start a subprocess to capture stderr output and/or csvlogs into log files.

fields.name: global.maintenance_work_mem
fields.summary: Sets the maximum memory to be used for maintenance operations.
fields.description: This includes operations such as VACUUM and CREATE INDEX.

fields.name: global.max_connections
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.

fields.name: global.max_files_per_process
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously open files for each server process.

fields.name: global.max_function_args
fields.summary: Shows the maximum number of function arguments.

fields.name: global.max_identifier_length
fields.summary: Shows the maximum identifier length.

fields.name: global.max_index_keys
fields.summary: Shows the maximum number of index keys.

fields.name: global.max_locks_per_transaction
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of locks per transaction.
fields.description: The shared lock table is sized on the assumption that at most max_locks_per_transaction * max_connections distinct objects will need to be locked at any one time.

fields.name: global.max_parallel_workers_per_gather
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of parallel processes per executor node.

fields.name: global.max_pred_locks_per_transaction
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of predicate locks per transaction.
fields.description: The shared predicate lock table is sized on the assumption that at most max_pred_locks_per_transaction * max_connections distinct objects will need to be locked at any one time.

fields.name: global.max_prepared_transactions
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.

fields.name: global.max_replication_slots
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously defined replication slots.

fields.name: global.max_stack_depth
fields.summary: Sets the maximum stack depth, in kilobytes.

fields.name: global.max_standby_archive_delay
fields.summary: Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing archived WAL data.

fields.name: global.max_standby_streaming_delay
fields.summary: Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing streamed WAL data.

fields.name: global.max_wal_senders
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running WAL sender processes.

fields.name: global.max_wal_size
fields.summary: Sets the WAL size that triggers a checkpoint.

fields.name: global.max_worker_processes
fields.summary: Maximum number of concurrent worker processes.

fields.name: global.min_parallel_relation_size
fields.summary: Sets the minimum size of relations to be considered for parallel scan.

fields.name: global.min_wal_size
fields.summary: Sets the minimum size to shrink the WAL to.

fields.name: global.old_snapshot_threshold
fields.summary: Time before a snapshot is too old to read pages changed after the snapshot was taken.
fields.description: A value of -1 disables this feature.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.operator_precedence_warning
fields.summary: Emit a warning for constructs that changed meaning since PostgreSQL 9.4.

fields.name: global.parallel_setup_cost
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of starting up worker processes for parallel query.

fields.name: global.parallel_tuple_cost
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of passing each tuple (row) from worker to master backend.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.password_encryption
fields.summary: Encrypt passwords.
fields.description: When a password is specified in CREATE USER or ALTER USER without writing either ENCRYPTED or UNENCRYPTED, this parameter determines whether the password is to be encrypted.

fields.name: global.port
fields.summary: Sets the TCP port the server listens on.

fields.name: global.post_auth_delay
fields.summary: Waits N seconds on connection startup after authentication.
fields.description: This allows attaching a debugger to the process.

fields.name: global.pre_auth_delay
fields.summary: Waits N seconds on connection startup before authentication.
fields.description: This allows attaching a debugger to the process.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.quote_all_identifiers
fields.summary: When generating SQL fragments, quote all identifiers.

fields.name: global.random_page_cost
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a nonsequentially fetched disk page.

fields.name: global.replacement_sort_tuples
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of tuples to be sorted using replacement selection.
fields.description: When more tuples than this are present, quicksort will be used.

fields.name: global.restart_after_crash
fields.summary: Reinitialize server after backend crash.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.row_security
fields.summary: Enable row security.
fields.description: When enabled, row security will be applied to all users.

fields.name: global.search_path
fields.summary: Sets the schema search order for names that are not schema-qualified.

fields.name: global.segment_size
fields.summary: Shows the number of pages per disk file.

fields.name: global.seq_page_cost
fields.summary: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a sequentially fetched disk page.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.server_encoding
fields.summary: Sets the server (database) character set encoding.

fields.name: global.server_version
fields.summary: Shows the server version.

fields.name: global.server_version_num
fields.summary: Shows the server version as an integer.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Shared Library Preloading
fields.name: global.session_preload_libraries
fields.summary: Lists shared libraries to preload into each backend.

fields.name: global.session_replication_role
fields.summary: Sets the session's behavior for triggers and rewrite rules.

fields.name: global.shared_buffers
fields.summary: Sets the number of shared memory buffers used by the server.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Shared Library Preloading
fields.name: global.shared_preload_libraries
fields.summary: Lists shared libraries to preload into server.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.sql_inheritance
fields.summary: Causes subtables to be included by default in various commands.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl
fields.summary: Enables SSL connections.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl_ca_file
fields.summary: Location of the SSL certificate authority file.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl_cert_file
fields.summary: Location of the SSL server certificate file.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl_ciphers
fields.summary: Sets the list of allowed SSL ciphers.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl_crl_file
fields.summary: Location of the SSL certificate revocation list file.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl_ecdh_curve
fields.summary: Sets the curve to use for ECDH.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl_key_file
fields.summary: Location of the SSL server private key file.

fields.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
fields.name: global.ssl_prefer_server_ciphers
fields.summary: Give priority to server ciphersuite order.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.standard_conforming_strings
fields.summary: Causes '...' strings to treat backslashes literally.

fields.name: global.statement_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the maximum allowed duration of any statement.
fields.description: A value of 0 turns off the timeout.

fields.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
fields.name: global.stats_temp_directory
fields.summary: Writes temporary statistics files to the specified directory.

fields.name: global.superuser_reserved_connections
fields.summary: Sets the number of connection slots reserved for superusers.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
fields.name: global.synchronize_seqscans
fields.summary: Enable synchronized sequential scans.

fields.name: global.synchronous_commit
fields.summary: Sets the current transaction's synchronization level.

fields.name: global.synchronous_standby_names
fields.summary: Number of synchronous standbys and list of names of potential synchronous ones.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.syslog_facility
fields.summary: Sets the syslog "facility" to be used when syslog enabled.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.syslog_ident
fields.summary: Sets the program name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in syslog.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.syslog_sequence_numbers
fields.summary: Add sequence number to syslog messages to avoid duplicate suppression.

fields.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
fields.name: global.syslog_split_messages
fields.summary: Split messages sent to syslog by lines and to fit into 1024 bytes.

fields.name: global.tcp_keepalives_count
fields.summary: Maximum number of TCP keepalive retransmits.
fields.description: This controls the number of consecutive keepalive retransmits that can be lost before a connection is considered dead. A value of 0 uses the system default.

fields.name: global.tcp_keepalives_idle
fields.summary: Time between issuing TCP keepalives.
fields.description: A value of 0 uses the system default.

fields.name: global.tcp_keepalives_interval
fields.summary: Time between TCP keepalive retransmits.
fields.description: A value of 0 uses the system default.

fields.name: global.temp_buffers
fields.summary: Sets the maximum number of temporary buffers used by each session.

fields.name: global.temp_file_limit
fields.summary: Limits the total size of all temporary files used by each process.
fields.description: -1 means no limit.

fields.name: global.temp_tablespaces
fields.summary: Sets the tablespace(s) to use for temporary tables and sort files.

fields.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
fields.name: global.timezone_abbreviations
fields.summary: Selects a file of time zone abbreviations.

fields.name: global.trace_notify
fields.summary: Generates debugging output for LISTEN and NOTIFY.

fields.name: global.trace_recovery_messages
fields.summary: Enables logging of recovery-related debugging information.
fields.description: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.

fields.name: global.trace_sort
fields.summary: Emit information about resource usage in sorting.

fields.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
fields.name: global.track_activities
fields.summary: Collects information about executing commands.
fields.description: Enables the collection of information on the currently executing command of each session, along with the time at which that command began execution.

fields.name: global.track_activity_query_size
fields.summary: Sets the size reserved for pg_stat_activity.query, in bytes.

fields.name: global.track_commit_timestamp
fields.summary: Collects transaction commit time.

fields.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
fields.name: global.track_counts
fields.summary: Collects statistics on database activity.

fields.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
fields.name: global.track_functions
fields.summary: Collects function-level statistics on database activity.

fields.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
fields.name: global.track_io_timing
fields.summary: Collects timing statistics for database I/O activity.

fields.name: global.transaction_deferrable
fields.summary: Whether to defer a read-only serializable transaction until it can be executed with no possible serialization failures.

fields.name: global.transaction_isolation
fields.summary: Sets the current transaction's isolation level.

fields.name: global.transaction_read_only
fields.summary: Sets the current transaction's read-only status.

fields.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Other Platforms and Clients
fields.name: global.transform_null_equals
fields.summary: Treats "expr=NULL" as "expr IS NULL".
fields.description: When turned on, expressions of the form expr = NULL (or NULL = expr) are treated as expr IS NULL, that is, they return true if expr evaluates to the null value, and false otherwise. The correct behavior of expr = NULL is to always return null (unknown).

fields.name: global.unix_socket_directories
fields.summary: Sets the directories where Unix-domain sockets will be created.

fields.name: global.unix_socket_group
fields.summary: Sets the owning group of the Unix-domain socket.
fields.description: The owning user of the socket is always the user that starts the server.

fields.name: global.unix_socket_permissions
fields.summary: Sets the access permissions of the Unix-domain socket.
fields.description: Unix-domain sockets use the usual Unix file system permission set. The parameter value is expected to be a numeric mode specification in the form accepted by the chmod and umask system calls. (To use the customary octal format the number must start with a 0 (zero).)

fields.name: global.update_process_title
fields.summary: Updates the process title to show the active SQL command.
fields.description: Enables updating of the process title every time a new SQL command is received by the server.

fields.name: global.vacuum_cost_delay
fields.summary: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds.

fields.name: global.vacuum_cost_limit
fields.summary: Vacuum cost amount available before napping.

fields.name: global.vacuum_cost_page_dirty
fields.summary: Vacuum cost for a page dirtied by vacuum.

fields.name: global.vacuum_cost_page_hit
fields.summary: Vacuum cost for a page found in the buffer cache.

fields.name: global.vacuum_cost_page_miss
fields.summary: Vacuum cost for a page not found in the buffer cache.

fields.name: global.vacuum_defer_cleanup_age
fields.summary: Number of transactions by which VACUUM and HOT cleanup should be deferred, if any.

fields.name: global.vacuum_freeze_min_age
fields.summary: Minimum age at which VACUUM should freeze a table row.

fields.name: global.vacuum_freeze_table_age
fields.summary: Age at which VACUUM should scan whole table to freeze tuples.

fields.name: global.vacuum_multixact_freeze_min_age
fields.summary: Minimum age at which VACUUM should freeze a MultiXactId in a table row.

fields.name: global.vacuum_multixact_freeze_table_age
fields.summary: Multixact age at which VACUUM should scan whole table to freeze tuples.

fields.name: global.wal_block_size
fields.summary: Shows the block size in the write ahead log.

fields.name: global.wal_buffers
fields.summary: Sets the number of disk-page buffers in shared memory for WAL.

fields.name: global.wal_compression
fields.summary: Compresses full-page writes written in WAL file.

fields.name: global.wal_keep_segments
fields.summary: Sets the number of WAL files held for standby servers.

fields.name: global.wal_level
fields.summary: Set the level of information written to the WAL.

fields.name: global.wal_log_hints
fields.summary: Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint, even for a non-critical modifications.

fields.name: global.wal_receiver_status_interval
fields.summary: Sets the maximum interval between WAL receiver status reports to the primary.

fields.name: global.wal_receiver_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the maximum wait time to receive data from the primary.

fields.name: global.wal_retrieve_retry_interval
fields.summary: Sets the time to wait before retrying to retrieve WAL after a failed attempt.

fields.name: global.wal_segment_size
fields.summary: Shows the number of pages per write ahead log segment.

fields.name: global.wal_sender_timeout
fields.summary: Sets the maximum time to wait for WAL replication.

fields.name: global.wal_sync_method
fields.summary: Selects the method used for forcing WAL updates to disk.

fields.name: global.wal_writer_delay
fields.summary: Time between WAL flushes performed in the WAL writer.

fields.name: global.wal_writer_flush_after
fields.summary: Amount of WAL written out by WAL writer that triggers a flush.

fields.name: global.work_mem
fields.summary: Sets the maximum memory to be used for query workspaces.
fields.description: This much memory can be used by each internal sort operation and hash table before switching to temporary disk files.

fields.name: global.xmlbinary
fields.summary: Sets how binary values are to be encoded in XML.

fields.name: global.xmloption
fields.summary: Sets whether XML data in implicit parsing and serialization operations is to be considered as documents or content fragments.

fields.name: global.zero_damaged_pages
fields.summary: Continues processing past damaged page headers.
fields.description: Detection of a damaged page header normally causes PostgreSQL to report an error, aborting the current transaction. Setting zero_damaged_pages to true causes the system to instead report a warning, zero out the damaged page, and continue processing. This behavior will destroy data, namely all the rows on the damaged page.
